00024 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTrig4ChanTreeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00025 {
00026   fTree->Branch("trigger", &ftrig, "trigger/i");
00027   fTree->Branch("UpClock", &fUpClock, "Upclock/i");
00028   fTree->Branch("LowClock", &fLowClock, "LowClock/i");
00029    fTree->Branch("Clock", &fClock, "Clock/l");
00030   return kSuccess;
00031 }

00033 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORTrig4ChanTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00034 {
00035   // check severity to improve speed
00036   if(ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) { 
00037     ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): got one: "
00038                   << "trig-up-low = " 
00039                   << fTrig4ChanDecoder->trigOf(record) << "-" 
00040                   << fTrig4ChanDecoder->UpClockOf(record) << "-" 
00041      << fTrig4ChanDecoder->LowClockOf(record) << "-" 
00042                   << fTrig4ChanDecoder->ClockOf(record) << endl;
00043   }
00044 
00045   ftrig = fTrig4ChanDecoder->trigOf(record);
00046   fUpClock  = fTrig4ChanDecoder->UpClockOf(record);
00047   fLowClock = fTrig4ChanDecoder->LowClockOf(record);
00048    fClock = fTrig4ChanDecoder->ClockOf(record);
00049 
00050   return kSuccess;
00051 }
